   // nyāyavārttikatātparyapariśuddhiḥ //	// nyAyavArttika tAtparya pariSudDiH //
   mātaḥ sarasvati punaḥ punaraṣa natvā	mAtar sarasvati punar punar aza natvA
   baddhāñjaliḥ kimapi vijñapayāmyavaihi /	badDAQjaliH kim api vijQapayAmi avEhi /
   vākcetasormama tathā bhava sāvadhānā	vAc cetasoH mama taTA Bava sAvaDAnA
   vācaspatervacasi na skhalato yathaite //	vAcaspateH vacasi na sKalataH yaTA ete //
   viśvārādhya ityatra viśvaśabdena saṃsāricetanavargo vivakṣitaḥ, tasyaiva	viSva ArADyaH iti atra viSva Sabdena saMsAri cetana vargaH vivakzitaH, tasya eva
   tadārādhakatvāt /	tad ArADaka tvAt /
   viśveśāna ityatra samīhitaphalasaṃdohaḥ, tasya bhagavadekādhīnatvāt /	viSveSAnaH iti atra samIhita Pala saMdohaH, tasya Bagavat eka aDIna tvAt /
   viśvakṛdityatropādānasamūhaḥ, tasyaiva tatkṛtivyāpyatvāt /	viSva kRt iti atra upAdAna samUhaH, tasya eva tad kRti vyApya tvAt /
   viśvasaṃhārakārītyatra yāvadanityanivahaḥ, tasyaiva tadvināśyatvāt /	viSva saMhAra kArI iti atra yAvat anitya nivahaH, tasya eva tad vinASya tvAt /
   viśvaśaktirityatra yāvatkāryāstomaḥ, tasyaiva tacchaktiviṣayatvāt /	viSva SaktiH iti atra yAvat kAryAstomaH, tasya eva tad Sakti vizaya tvAt /
   viśvajñātetyatra yāvañjñeyaprapañcaḥ, tasyaiva pajjñānaviṣayatvāt /	viSvajQAtA iti atra yAvan jQeya prapaQcaH, tasya eva pad jQAna vizaya tvAt /
   viśvavyāpīyatra yāvanmūrttimaddravyarāśiḥ, tasyaiva viśeṣatastadvyāpyatvāt	viSva vyApIyatra yAvat mUrttimat dravya rASiH, tasya eva viSezataH tat vyApya tvAt
   itarasya tu taddvārā /	itarasya tu tad dvArA /
   viśvamūrtirityatra yāvatkārakagrāmaḥ, tasyaiva sākṣāt	viSvamUrtiH iti atra yAvat kAraka grAmaH, tasya eva sAkzAt 
   tatprayatnādhiṣṭheyatayā asmadādiśarīrasamānatvāt /	tad prayatna aDizWeya tayA asmad Adi SarIra samAna tvAt /
   ata eva na tatra śarīrāntarāpekṣā, sākṣātprayantānadhiṣṭheyeṣu hi sā syāt	atas eva na tatra SarIra antara apekzA, sAkzAt prayantAn aDizWeyezu hi sA syAt 
   daṇḍādivat /	daNxa Adi vat /

   samādhānamadhyavaseyam iti //	samADAna maDyavaseyam iti //
   namāmītyādi /	namAmi ityAdi /
   dharmo nivartakaḥ /	DarmaH nivartakaH /
   vijñānaṃ śarīrādiviviktātmasākṣātkāraḥ /	vijQAnam SarIra Adi vivikta Atma sAkzAtkAraH /
   vairāgyaṃ rāgābhāvaḥ /	vErAgyam rAga aBAvaH /
   aiśvaryaṃ bhūtendriyajayaḥ /	ESvaryam BUta indriya jayaH /
   tacchānipe, ata eva nidhaye vāgviśaddhīnām /	tat SAnipe, atas eva niDaye vAc viSat hInAm /
   adharmahetuko hyavivekaḥ /	aDarma hetukaH hi avivekaH /
   avivekahetukamavairāgyam, avairāgyamūlamanaiśvaryam /	aviveka hetukam avErAgyam, avErAgya mUlam anESvaryam /
   tanmūlāśca vacasāmaviśuddhayaḥ /	tad mUlAH ca vacasAm aviSudDayaH /
   tisraḥ khalvetāḥ /	tisraH Kalu etAH /
   tatra prathamā nirabhidhayatā /	tatra praTamA niraBiDayatA /
   dvitīyā viparītāmidheyatā /	dvitIyA viparIta AmiDeya tA /
   tṛtīyā niṣprayojanāmigheyatā /	tRtIyA nizprayojanAmiGeya tA /
   tā etāḥ kathaṃ bhūtendriyajayino mahāmunerbhaviṣyanti? ajitabhūtasya hi	tAH etAH kaTam BUta indriya jayinaH mahA muneH Bavizyanti? ajita BUtasya hi
   vivakṣostathāvidhaprayatnāniṣpatternirabhidheyā vāk bhavati /	vivakzoH taTAviDa prayatna anizpatteH niraBiDeyA vAc Bavati /
   ajitendriyasya ca viparyāsavipralipsāhetuko viparītārtho vacanasandarbhaḥ	ajita indriyasya ca viparyAsa vipralipsA hetukaH viparIta arTaH vacana sandarBaH
   ajitamanasaśca pramādonmādavato niṣprayojanaḥ /	ajita manasaH ca pramAda unmAdavataH nizprayojanaH /

   prapañcayiṣyati /	prapaQcayizyati /

   ata eva tāyī tattvādhyavasāyasaṃrakṣaṇakṣamasaṃpradāyapravartakaḥ //	atas eva tAyI tattva aDyavasAya saMrakzaNa kzama saMpradAya pravartakaH //
   evaṃ parāparagurūn natvā śiṣyabuddhisamādhānāya samāhitavaiśiṣṭyaṃ	evam parApara gurUn natvA Sizya budDi samADAnAya samAhita vESizwyam
   darśayati  grantheti /	darSayati  granTa iti /

   na ca śiṣyāṇāṃ kathantāsaṃboghavidhurāṇāṃ rāddhāntamātraparigrahaḥ	na ca SizyANAm kaTantA saMboGa viDurANAm rAdDAnta mAtra parigrahaH
   saṃkṣepato vivakṣitaḥ /	saMkzepataH vivakzitaH /

   kimanenetyata āha  nirastākhiladūṣaṇeti /	kim anena iti atas Aha   nirasta aKila dUzaNA iti /

   granthagauravamityata āha  granthavyākhyācchalenaiveti //	granTa gOravam iti atas Aha  granTa vyAKyA= Calena eva iti //
   nanu cirantare 'smin nibandhe mahājanaparigṛhīte bahavo	nanu cirantare asmin nibanDe mahA jana parigRhIte bahavaH 
   nibandhāstathāvidhāḥ santīti kṛtamanene ityata āha   icchāmīti /	nibanDAH taTAviDAH santi iti kRtam anene iti atas Aha  icCAmi iti /
   nanu yadi granthakārasaṃpradāyavicchedena te nibandhāḥ, kathaṃ	nanu yadi granTakAra saMpradAya vicCedena te nibanDAH, kaTam
   kunibandhāḥ? atha saṃpradāyo vicchinnaḥ, kathaṃ tavāpīyaṃ	kunibanDAH? aTa saMpradAyaH vicCinnaH, kaTam tava api iyam
   vicchinnasaṃpradāyā tātparyaṭīkā sunibandha ityata āha  atijaratīnāmiti /	vicCinna saMpradAyA tAtparyawIkA su nibanDaH iti atas Aha  ati jaratInAm iti /
   uddyotakarasaṃpradāyo hyamūṣāṃ yauvanam /	uddyota kara saMpradAyaH hi amUzAm yOvanam /

   punarnavībhāvāya dīyata iti yujyate /	punarnavIBAvAya dIyate iti yujyate /

   tatra bhagavato 'kṣapādasya muniṣu madhye pravaratvaṃ śrutyādibhya eva	tatra BagavataH akzapAdasya munizu maDye pravara tvam Sruti AdiByaH eva
   suprasiddham kimanena saṃkīrtanena? na caitadatiśayena sāṃpratamupayujyate	su prasidDam kim anena saMkIrtanena? na ca etat atiSayena sAMpratam upayujyate
   jagadupaśamanidānaśāstrapraṇetṛtvaṃ ca tasya tatpraṇayanameva	jagat upaSama nidAna SAstra praNetR tvam ca tasya tad praNayanam eva
   prakaṭayadasti /	prakawayat asti /
   tenāpi kiṃ prakaṭitena? svanibandhasya tadviṣayatāpi tadvyākhyānādeva	tena api kim prakawitena? sva nibanDasya tat vizaya tA api tad vyAKyAnAt eva
   labhyata iti /	laByate iti /
   kiṃ tayāpi kathitayā? na cāsya nyāyamahodadherūttānatāpratibhāsa evāgrataḥ	kim tayA api kaTitayA? na ca asya nyAya mahodaDeru utta AnatA pratiBAsaH eva agratas 
   kartumucitaḥ /	kartum ucitaH /
   tasmād bhavitavyamatra tātparyeṇa /	tasmAt Bavitavyam atra tAtparyeNa /

   parāmṛśatā śāstrasyaivāyaṃ nibandha iti darśitam /	parAmRSatA SAstrasya eva ayam nibanDaH iti darSitam /

   manyate, mīmāṃsāyā iva vedāt /	manyate, mImAMsAyAH iva vedAt /

   kariṣyata iti vyākhyānaṃ ṭīkāvirodhenopekṣaṇīyam /	karizyate iti vyAKyAnam wIkA viroDena upekzaNIyam /
   nanu sūtroktaprayojanānuvādaḥ punaḥ kimartham? na hīdamanūdya kiñcid	nanu sUtra ukta prayojana anuvAdaH punar kim arTam? na hi idam anUdya kiQcid 
   vidheyaṃ pratiṣedhyaṃ veha vidyate ityata āha  sūtreti /	viDeyam pratizeDyam vA iha vidyate iti atas Aha  sUtra iti /

   āha  prekṣāvaditi /	Aha   prekzA vat iti /
   nanu vyutpitsavo vyutpattimaghikṛtya pravartante /	nanu vyutpitsavaH vyutpattim aGikRtya pravartante /
   ato vyutpādanapravṛttau vyutpattirevāmīṣāṃ prayojanamiti kimapareṇa	atas vyutpAdana pravRttO vyutpattiH eva amIzAm prayojanam iti kim apareNa

   tatra mukhyaṃ puruṣārtha eva /	tatra muKyam puruza arTaH eva /
   itarat tu tadaṅgamiti /	itarat tu tad aFgam iti /

   tadapi prayojanamevati /	tat api prayojanam evati /

   tasmistvasati tadapi na syāditi niṣprayojanataivāvatiṣṭhate /	tasmiH tu asati tat api na syAt iti nizprayojana tA eva avatizWate /

   mukhyaṃ prayojanamastīti darśite prekṣāvān pravarttito	muKyam prayojanam asti iti darSite prekzAvAn pravarttitaH

   nyāyāt /	nyAyAt /

   tadaṅgatāmiyāt /	tad aFga tAm iyAt /

   upaniṣatsu, na cāsau puruṣārthaḥ /	upanizatsu, na ca asO puruza arTaH /
   ato na mukhyaṃ prayojanamityata āha  atra ceti /	atas na muKyam prayojanam iti atas Aha  atra ca iti /
   nanu jagataḥ śamāyeti durghaṭam, asaṃbhāvitātvādaśakyātvācca /	nanu jagataH SamAya iti durGawam, asaMBAvitA tvAt aSakyA tvAt ca /
   na tāvat kaścit jagadupacikīrṣuḥ kvacit pravartate yato munerapi tathātvaṃ	na tAvat kaScid jagat upacikIrzuH kvacid pravartate yatas muneH api taTAtvam
   saṃbhāvayāmaḥ /	saMBAvayAmaH /

   na ca śakyametat, bubhukṣūṇāṃ pravartayitumaśakyatvāt /	na ca Sakyam etat, buBukzUNAm pravartayitum aSakyatvAt /
   na ca jagadeva mumukṣati /	na ca jagat eva mumukzati /
   tasmādanuṣṭhātaiva vyutpādyaḥ śāstrāntaralabdhabrāhmaṇatvadirūpaḥ śiṣyaḥ /	tasmAt anuzWAtA eva vyutpAdyaH SAstra antara labDa brAhmaNa tva dirUpaH SizyaH /
   tasya ca rūpāṇi śamadamādisaṃpattiḥ nityānityavivekaḥ	tasya ca rUpANi Sama dama Adi saMpattiH nitya anitya vivekaH
   aihikāmuṣmikabhāgavairāgyaṃ mumukṣutā ceti /	EhikA muzmika BAga vErAgyam mumukzutA ca iti /

   bhavati /	Bavati /
   tatraitat syāt /	tatra etat syAt /
   na tāvadupeyaviṣayeyamadhikāracintā, tasya puruṣaprayatnāviṣayatvāt,	na tAvat upeya vizayeyam aDikAra cintA, tasya puruza prayatna avizaya tvAt,

   upāyastu pramāṇam, na ca vedādhyayanavadanumānasya pratyakṣasya copādānaṃ	upAyaH tu pramANam, na ca veda aDyayana vat anumAnasya pratyakzasya ca upAdAnam

   tvanumānamapyāgamāvirodhenānusandhīyamānamathaniścāyakam, natu	tu anumAnam api Agama aviroDena anusanDIyamAnam aTa niScAyakam, na tu
   tadviruddhamapi /	tad virudDam api /

   samāsādayet /	samAsAdayet /

   'nadhikṛtā iva /	anaDikRtAH iva /
   ato yāvadadhikāriparo 'yaṃ jagacchabda iti kecit /	atas yAvat aDikAri paraH ayam jagat SabdaH iti kecid /
